item.title: How Do I Create This Site
item.description: I have browsed through a lot beautify sites which are created by github page, and I want to try a new statics site framework, so I started this site using Hugo. Here are the step by step guide that reproduced the entire process. Install Hugo through Homebrew Just follow what Hugo Documentation said here. Try out the rudimentary theme Before you install other themes, first run $ hugo new site blog.
